summary: Nord Mage Sisters Cinder and Frost
descriptionHtml:
:::Requested Mod:::

This mod introduces Nord sister mages Cinder and Frost (who specialize in fire and ice magic respectively). They are essential followers, they can be married, and they have different voice types so you can tell them apart should you use a multiple companion mod. You can find them in their rented room at the Four Shields Tavern in Dragon Bridge (Southwest of Solitude).

Like all of my other companion mods; Cinder and Frost will loiter around in the area that you dismiss them once you tell them you want to part ways (drop them as a companion). So if you can\'t find them after you ask them to leave your service make sure to go back to where you left them. I set their AI up this way so that you can leave them in a convenient place and they won\'t wonder off (you can also have them stay behind in one of your houses until you want them to tag along with you again). Remember that ALL of my companion mods have this feature.

IMPORTANT NOTE: This mod must have the following mod in order to work correctly:
:::Apachii Sky Hair:::
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10168
If you have issues with hair colors turning dark when near light sources; download teh vanilla hair option on Apachii\'s page and that should fix the issue.

Manual Installation:
Place the zip file\'s contents into your Skyrim/data folder to install and be sure to activate the ESP and ESM files in your Data Files listing. Ensure that the Apachii Sky Hair ESP and ESM are ABOVE Summer and Autumn\'s data files in your load order (I\'d recommend placing their files dead last in the load order so there are no conflicts).

Recommended (but not required) mods to get them as they appears in the screen shots:

CBBE V3 (standard body) and the hip texture compatability pack:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666

Bella\'s Better Females version 3:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2812

Cover Eyes (eyes 1 file):
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4869

Killer Keos Skimpy CBBE V2 Armor Set:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3654

Special thanks to Blackie for his CM New Companions mod that includes a top-notch detailed tutorial on how to create Skyrim companions without the face discoloration bug. Get his mod and tutorial (contained in the mod) here:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11669

The work around I found for the bug with Bella\'s face mod (the bug involving women looking like they have faint beard stubble on their jawline and chin) is to use the standard Better Faces Version 3, and then apply the \"No Shine\" option available on her mod page.

Special note: All of my future companions after Divada, Taja, Viin, and Kyia will be made using the Better Females by Bella mod. I switched to another mod set for faces previously due to a bug I couldn\'t resolve (the issue with females having faint male beard stubble on their faces while using Bella\'s). I have resolved that issue, so I\'ll be going back to Bella\'s for my projects from now on. You DO NOT have to switch to Bella\'s if you use Envision faces and RANs Headmesh (what I used previously) OR if you use other face mods. All of my companions should work with other face/body mods and vanilla setups unless specifically mentioned in the description.

Thanks for looking at my work, and I hope you enjoy taking Cinder and Frost with you on your adventures. Feedback is welcomed and remember to endorse it if you like it.

I recommend a manual install of this mod (read me included in the zip file). Install with Nexus Mod Manager at your own risk.

IMPORTANT NOTE: One commenter has posted that this mods alters the costs of some spells (makes their mana cost cheaper). Be aware that this might affect your game if it has affected someone else\'s. I have no clue how or why it\'s causing this to happen (I made no edits to companion spell beyond selecting spells for them to use), but be aware of it. If enough people complain about this issue, I\'ll delete this mod so it doesn\'t cause issues for people.
